desc: Aventis Warehouse & Distribution is dedicated to supplying the best quality products at very competitive prices. Our ACE brand offers consumables and chemicals that can be used in any commercial environment. Aventis Warehouse & Distribution is a direct distributor of Montessori Equipment and Furniture.

layout.text: Distributor of Montessori Equipment and Furniture

Aventis Warehouse & Distribution is a direct distributor for Montessori Equipment and Furniture, and most of our products are available on pre order due to the current COVID-19 restrictions and the impact it's having on both our International and local supply chain.
